data.title: Capitol Steps on the Air
data.text:
Pre-pandemic Flashback! Alas, the coronavirus has sidelined the Capitol Steps, and 2020 was the first year in decades time without our traditional Fourth of July or New Year's Eve radio broadcasts. We can all use a good laugh, and we hope to be back soon.

Listen on-line: Here are New Year's Eve broadcasts from 2016, post-election/pre-Trump, and from last year, pre-pandemic. If you want to be sure to never miss a show, then get the free iTunes downloads here and subscribe to the podcast, or use this RSS feed. Subscribe to us also on YouTube.

New Year's Eve 2016/2017 Edition:

Politics Takes a Holiday!

Recorded live at the Ronald Reagan Building in DC.

(One hour: 57 MB)

New Year's Eve 2019/2020 Edition:

Politics Takes a Holiday!

Recorded live at the Ronald Reagan Building in DC.

(One hour: 57 MB)

The Capitol Steps Radio Network
